website_summaries.verdict: Small enough to fit in your back pocket, but powerful enough to keep your bike safe.
pros: Comes in two colors: red and yellow
Lightweight and only 5.5 inches, it is small enough to fit in your back pocket
Double bolting shackle protects against lock picking
Soft coating won't scuff your bike
cons: This lock is thin enough to be cut with powerful bolt cutters

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Bike was stolen, lock was cut
customer_reviews.text: My bike was stolen when I locked it using this lock. It looked like someone had cut through the lock with a large set of wire cutters. If you live in an area where bike theft is common, I would recommend buying a much thicker lock.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bike Protection!
customer_reviews.text: Before choosing a U-Lock for my bike, I read many reviews and watched many videos on people breaking U-Locks, and I've got to say that this U-Lock is a winner!! It's truly one of the top U-locks and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Since bike theft is relatively common in the area I'm in, I bought 2 Abus - one to lock my rear wheels through the triangle to the rack, and the other to lock my front wheel to my bike frame. So far, things are going great! This lock is good because not only is it small enough, but it's also quite thick and is double bolted. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Very secure, but not right for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research before buying this lock. I ended up getting this one because it is top-notch in terms of security, and it's relatively small (though heavy). The size, unfortunately, is a problem -- it's too short to get around the frame, a wheel, and the bike rack in almost every case. I bought a separate cable to use with it, but frankly having to carry and use both the lock and the cable every time is a pain, and I end up avoiding situations where I need to lock it. Eventually I'll probably buy another, technically less secure lock that's more convenient considering my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Carrieee

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to use lock
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth lock. Easy to put together and remove. Its not as small as others imply. It's big enough to lock the wheel through the spoke and one side of the frame through the rack and that's good enough for me. I mainly want to use it for short rides where I'm stopping for a bite or movie or something. so I think it is very secure for my purposes and big enough without having to worry about it fitting around the rack bar. it's not as light as I thought it would be, but i put it in my backpack this morning and did not notice a ton more weight so it seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock
customer_reviews.text: Abus quality at a smaller size and price point. Great value, you can't beat these shackles for the price. The rubberized coating gives some peace of mind regarding my bike's paint, and the smaller size helps prevent leverage based attacks. This plus a heavy chain are my go-to combination.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Chutuk

customer_reviews.title: Very well made lock/light weight/ and good theft deterrent since is not so popular as those Kryptonite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock over the Kryptonite since the price was a bit more affordable for me. Pros: - Very good double lock mechanisim - Not too heavy - Great rubber skin to protect bike paint - Good color choices - Better choice over the Krypto EVO series. Cons: - The key sometimes does not turn all the way if is not fully inserted - The size could be a few mm bigger I would recommend this lock as a must have added layer of protection to prevent bike thiefs from steally your bike.
customer_reviews.author: Osiris A. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy lock. It's heavy and made of great material
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy lock. It's heavy and made of great material. However within a few month sometimes the key gets stuck while turning and I have to try several times to unlock my bike. Therefore I cannot give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan

customer_reviews.title: I like how smooth the locking mechanism works
customer_reviews.text: I like how smooth the locking mechanism works. I had an OnGuard one before where I had to fidget with the key to get it in exactly that right place or it wouldn't turn. And even then the mechanism would kind of grind while turning the key. This Abus however is smooth, as it should be. There's nothing cheap about this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Piltingsrud

customer_reviews.title: Stout and very user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally useful lock. Abus has solved the weight-resistance-usability problem by making its shackle shorter than the Kryptonite Millenium's but much thicker: 14mm, the same thickness as the Kryptonite Evolution 4 but a lot lighter. The lock is hefty, but manageable and the action is silky smooth. I've tried a lot of locks and, for a lock that you'll actually USE (as opposed, say, to six-pound chains), this the best thing I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L

customer_reviews.title: Dig it
customer_reviews.text: Great lil lock, fits in my back pocket or easily goes in my bag. A little heavy, which is expected considering it is a chunk of metal. Comes with several keys which is nice. One of the little black caps on the side came off mine, which isn't a big problem but is kinda annoying. These things happen I suppose, but overall it is a great lock that I think is a good choice for the streets.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very solid, easy to use. In my opinion strongest lightweight u lock out there. I compared to many others which were heavier or did not have both sides lock. I wanted a u lock which would not be too heavy so I could carry on my bike. when riding, I simply lock flat side on top and just behind seat post, then snug up u lock side around seat tube, and keep snug with small bungee cord too rear fork. works great.
customer_reviews.author: joseph shay

customer_reviews.title: May be overkill, but it'll make thieves reconsider
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought a Cannondale CAADX Ultegra '16, and the only times that I feel safe that it leave my sight is with the Abus X-Plus 1060 lock-chain binding the frame and front wheel to a secure anchor/post, plus an Abus Mini Round shackle U-lock securing the rear tire to the frame. The two combined are a bit heavy to lug around (chain snaked around seat post; U-Lock stowed in back pack), but the peace of mind I have when leaving my bike for any extended amount of time is worth the extra towing effort.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Locked up
customer_reviews.text: Though this lock is short, I haven't had any in which I couldn't find a secure place to properly lock my bike; however, it is a bit cumbersome to lock at times, and I have fidgeted with trying to get it locked for a good 10 minutes before. Sometimes as well, the lock will not disengage. After a few attempts of taking the key out and putting it back in, it eventually unlocks. A minor annoyance, but overall, I feel my bike is safe and the color is awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyForgotten

customer_reviews.title: Best lock ever
customer_reviews.text: I've locked my bike up all over with this lock, from downtown LA to Bed-Stuy Brooklyn, even down to Miami. I've left it overnight all over NYC and, combined with good wheel locking nuts (check out Pinhead Solid Axle Bicycle Wheel Lock), this lock has never failed me after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Feels secured and has great overalll reviews. Not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I do long road trips and the bike needs to be secured at night. I always felt secured with this lock. It is rather small so you need to find ways to secure your bike in a way that makes sense. But it's a nice lock which has got great reviews from many expert sites. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Serge Simard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little lock
customer_reviews.text: Feels very heavy duty and sturdy despite its small size. I was a bit surprised that it was heavier than I imagined. I wouldn't leave this on a bike left out overnight in a metropolitan area, but for a few hours I think this would be sufficient. Love the double locking mechanism feature.
customer_reviews.author: evas151

customer_reviews.title: Intimidating lock! Great security
customer_reviews.text: I've always trusted Kryptonite with my bike security. I read some great reviews of the U-Mini 40 and this is a great lock! The problem I've had with other brands is the key hole gets "jammed". I have yet to experience this with the ABUS. Also, it looks heavy duty and intimidating to potential thieves. So far, i've been pleased and it comes with 3 keys! Keep your "key card" to reorder more
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Tried it out with two bicycles in different parking areas.
customer_reviews.author: Daylight

customer_reviews.title: High Quality. Buy With Confidence.
customer_reviews.text: High quality sturdy lock that is easy to open with the key, and it comes with four keys. It says security rating 10 which I was happy about at first but then I learned that is out of 15....still okay but they should tell you on here that it is out of 15. Remember it is a "mini" lock so it is smaller but it is compact and feels very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Balthazar

customer_reviews.title: Key catches in lock
customer_reviews.text: The key catches constantly in the lock or just won’t turn sometimes. It’s really irritating to have to spend a minute straight fiddling with it just to get it locked or unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Generic pen name here

customer_reviews.title: easy to lock and unlock and does the job of ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot speak to it's theft deterrent potential it hasn't been tested yet. But the lock itself is extremely well made, easy to lock and unlock and does the job of locking my bike in next to the more expensive bikes with less sturdy locks (that's likely your best anti-theft system right there!) at the train station very well!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Instructions on brackets please!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, easy to carry although heavy. Now trying to figure out how to attach it to the bike so i don't have to carry it in my backpack. Great locking mechanism, have had it for a few months and like the size. My bike hasn't been stolen yet ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Robyn P.

customer_reviews.title: No Stress Leaving My Bike Thanks to This Lock
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended Abus by my local bike technician. Boy was he right. This lock is perfect for locking my fixie in New York City. Seriously. I leave it all day and am not the least bit worried that this lock will be broken. It's super compact and relatively lightweight for a lock. The only downside - which I can't detract a star from because the lock itself is so great - is that it won't fit all the way around signposts/poles in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Thieves cut the cable I used for the front wheel ...
customer_reviews.text: Thieves cut the cable I used for the front wheel of my bike but they couldn't get through this lock. They left the bike, and thankfully the front wheel too. This lock is heavy and compact enough for security but light enough to carry around on the bike without much annoyance. It also does not scratch up my frame when I hang it on my seat post while riding.
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very solid lock. Easy to handle. A great security to weight ratio. It is small so consider its size if you are looking for versatility of options to lock your bike to, as you will be somehow limited in that aspect. Other than that, I think it is one of the best bike lock options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made and solid security.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lock for the minimalist. Super solid and well made yet quite lightweight. I've been using this lock in Brooklyn for the last year leaving my bike locked up overnight at times and have had no issues to date. It's a mini U-lock so you might have to search out a suitable object to lock it to as it won't fit easily around a bike frame and thicker immovable object, but its weight is almost negligible compared to a chain offering comparable security so the trade off is well worth it to my mind.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Aboelela

customer_reviews.title: Worst lock ever
customer_reviews.text: Poor lock, used for 2 months now the key would not open the lock anymore. Poor quality key and bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: I have using this product for a few months now since my last onGuard ULock was decimated by thieves to steal my old schwinn. This lock is Solid , very easy to Lock and Unlock and is built sturdy. Use the sheldon brown method on your back wheel while using this lock and you'd have a lot of peace of mind. I must warn you though that if you are parking around multiple spots in the city , This is a mini ULock so doesn't go around a lot of thicker poles etc, so choose wisely. this along with a reliable cable lock or anti theft skewers will keep ur darling bike safe.
customer_reviews.author: amenon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light and almost fragile looking in contrast to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and almost fragile looking in contrast to a Kryptonite- the point of being concerned that thieves will interpret it as weak. I've had the lock several months now and it has problems sticking due to water getting in and drying out. So make sure to lube the lock occasionally. Bike hasn't been stolen yet with it (in NYC) so here's hoping..
customer_reviews.author: behonest

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be very well built. It's fairly heavy ~3lbs but can fit in a pocket if need be. It comes with several keys and unhooks on both sides which is helpful. The coating seems to be very durable and should protect your bike from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Rich E

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a very secure well built lock
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a very secure well built lock. Rattles alot when you ride. I put a couple of rubber washers on it and took care of the rattle. Also found a mount that worked. Kryptonite Transit mount works PERFECT...
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lock
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock that gets the job done, I've been looking at other bikes that are parked at my workplace, and this plus cables all over my bike will surely keep my bike safe :D , others look like you can steal 'em fast, this thing might be small, but looks and feels very secure, plus when you smack things it makes a big bang, free weapon included ;)
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Easy & secure
customer_reviews.text: I use this u-lock to lock up my electric scooter in a big city. It's really compact, portable, durable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, lightweight and compact lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock conveniently fits without any additional hardware locked around the toptube and downtube of the frame of my bike, and doesn't add much additional weight. It is easy to operate. The shackle is thick and sturdy, and the size is just big enough to lock frame to any signpost or parking meter in San Francisco. Combined with a cable to deter thieves from taking your wheels, this lock is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F

customer_reviews.title: The Kryptonite lock was nice but it was so freaking heavy and the keys ...
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I rocked the Kryptonite New York Fahgettaboudit U-Lock for a couple years. The Kryptonite lock was nice but it was so freaking heavy and the keys kind of got screwed up over the years. This Abus is a very reasonable weight and maybe even better quality than Kryptonite. If you aren't looking to break the bank and LOVE your bike, this is a great alternative to the popular Kryptonite locks.
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Seems good on day one.
customer_reviews.text: Good on first inspection. I would buy it from a store after tinkering with it.
customer_reviews.author: Titus Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Good strong lock!
customer_reviews.text: Good lock for your expensive bike! It's heavy but I don't see anyone getting through it without some real special tools. Defiantly a recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: nice side benefits
customer_reviews.text: can't speak to the security, but I like that it comes with four keys and has a padded rubber exterior so I can attach it to my bike while riding without worrying about it clanging against the frame
customer_reviews.author: Steven Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lock
customer_reviews.text: Unlocks and locks with ease and there's never any jamming when trying to get it locked or opened. Key stays on the lock when you unlock it to help prevent you from loosing the key. But even if you do it comes with 4. The U shaped part of the lock is coated with rubber so you won't be banging metal against your potentially expensive bike. This lock is a huge upgrade from those $20 locks you get at department stores and easily fits in one of the small pockets of my backpack for easy transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I love its size and I love its security (my city bike is still around so far) but I do wish it could be a touch lighter. Sidenote: I have found a lighter and equally secure lock by the same company, but it's twice as expensive. :(
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great lock. You can tell by the heft it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike courier here. This is a really great lock. You can tell by the heft it is almost as good as a kryptonite NYC. It has a similar vibe and is very small. Key and shackle design are not the best for ease of use but you get the hang of it quick. Hold up great after months rain, getting dropped, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: A 5 yr old can do it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 5 year old grandsons birthday. It’s the one he wanted. He locks his cute lil bike up at school! He can do it by himself!
customer_reviews.author: Adastra

customer_reviews.title: Heftier than expected--in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I've been pleased with this lock so far. It's much heftier than I expected. It's substantial, in a good way. It's not big at all, but it says "mini" in the name, so that's a given. As long as you can get the frame up to the post or rack, you're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid lock
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than a Krypto and stronger. German made no complaints. Has nice weight to it, and it's big enough to lock one wheel and frame
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I would suggest it for any of my friends. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skookum lock. Wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: The only available color was "yellow". The color I received was neon green. I removed the green plastic shield. Now it's all black. Lock seems very skookum. A+
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it 3 stars because my bike was never ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it 3 stars because my bike was never stolen in 3 years of light use. After constant issues with sticking, the key finally broke off inside the lock.
customer_reviews.author: LEA222

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I've had this since Feb 2012. One thing I would change--it could be ever so slightly bigger so that I could more easily lock my bike to parking meters when necessary. Would be nice if it came with a bike mounting unit. Overall great
customer_reviews.author: Boligrafo

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a very solid and high quality lock ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a very solid and high quality lock, time will tell how it holds up in the salt air at the Jersey Shore.
customer_reviews.author: Shore Build Construction

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, compact
customer_reviews.text: This lock is a bit heavy for its size, but it is very compact and portable in the pocket of a (large) seat bag that I use on my commuter bike. The smaller size makes it a bit more tricky to use when locking the rear wheel to a public bike rack, but it works if you lock the back tire through the rear triangle. Excellent, compact, and high-security lock that I use as my primary lock with a secondary cable for the front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: MGG

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock! Just big enough to fit around the frame and rack without leaving room to pry or jack the lock open. Small enough to fit in my back pocket or pocket of a messenger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Just that the length of the lock is slightly smaller as I was expecting. A longer lock helps in locking a bike from a distance. With this lock, I have to keep the bike very close to the pillar etc. Apart from that, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: dhruv kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lock that has latches on both ends of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lock that has latches on both ends of the "U". This makes it much more difficult to for a thief to remove it. The weight isn't bad either-meaning not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: PL Kagan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and solid. I wish it were two ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and solid. I wish it were two inches longer so I could fit it around my frame, a tire and even the thicker bike racks. As it is, it can only fit around my frame and the thick bike racks, or my frame, a tire and the really thin bike racks.
customer_reviews.author: Casska

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little too small for my liking but overall a solid lock
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Good mini lock
customer_reviews.text: Great little mini lock this is my secondary lock on the back wheels to the frame. Not sure it would be long enough to hook to a bike rack in the front.
customer_reviews.author: 54vior

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be my primary lock after becoming dissatisfied with the quality of the Pitbull mini-lock I had been using before. Much better quality. Worth the extra investment if you have a bike you really care about.
customer_reviews.author: Duran A. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock
customer_reviews.text: I picked this lock because it is smaller, which supposedly makes it harder to break into. On top of that, this lock is lighter than the similar version by Kryptonite. The other benefit is that these locks aren't as popular in the US, so it's less likely that people will have a matching key for it or know how to break it. Oh, and it has a locking mechanism on both sides of the lock, so if one end is compromised, the other will still hold. So far so good. Sometimes it's hard to lock up with such a small lock, but I think it's worth the hassle for better protection and something a little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lynn

customer_reviews.title: this bad boy is going strong as ever
customer_reviews.text: VERY durable and long lasting. While my friend's kryptonite locks keep rusting and jamming, this bad boy is going strong as ever!
customer_reviews.author: rurouni

customer_reviews.title: This lock is the most secure-feeling lock I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This lock is the most secure-feeling lock I have ever used. The double-sided lock makes it marginally more difficult to maneuver the lock in tight spots, but the added security is well worth it. The largest downside however, is the lack of a mounting bracket. I sorely miss having one, but that being the largest downside says a lot about the overall worth of this lock. Edit: After a year of having the lock bounce around on my frame, or shoved in a saddle bag, I finally took CTheSlayer's advice and purchased the flexframe bracket. It works absolutely perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: peterc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Lock Double shackle locking great value albeit a bit small (mini)
customer_reviews.text: Great Lock. It is sturdy although it is small it limits your locking to thinner poles and if you have thicker frames this may not be able to lock the frame and a pole. no replaceable keys although 3 are included overall a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R

customer_reviews.title: works great with the Abus cobra cable lock to lock up ...
customer_reviews.text: works great with the Abus cobra cable lock to lock up without worry in most places, like that both sides lock in.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, but pay attention to the size
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, but pay attention to the size. I believe it only locks the frame with the back wheel. If you need to tight the bike into something you will probably need a bigger lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME STRENGTH!
customer_reviews.text: I nought this for my Domestic Partner. He's VERY happy with it, since the new bike I bought him for his birthday was promptly stolen. This is a tough lock. He's happy as Pi to 26 places!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Joey

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: This lock is tough, stable and would require a lot of work for someone to hack off. I wish it were a little long, but for the money I can't see a better lock you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: excellent product; great value!
customer_reviews.text: Seems excellent! I did a lot of research on bike locks. Bottom line: U-locks are best. Abus seems a well respected company. I am impressed with quality, size, weight, and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, nice size and super thick. Much better than THAT other brand. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor guy

customer_reviews.title: Great lock just small
customer_reviews.text: Great lock just small, definitely only for one bike. Snug and not a lot of space. Just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Snappee Inc

customer_reviews.title: Too small and too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This lock is terrible. it is too small to wrap around a normal size bike frame and a street pole, and too heavy to carry around. I regret not trying it sooner so i can return it.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It's very sturdy but relatively lightweight.I have a few others; bell, kryptonyte,... but this one is the favorite one!!
customer_reviews.author: VE128686

customer_reviews.title: Very good and solid lock but had to return as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good and solid lock but had to return as it was too short to lock my bike to anything
customer_reviews.author: Ido K.

customer_reviews.title: safety  for sure
customer_reviews.text: great lock luv it even for the $$ it is worth it u got a bicycle worth more than $ 500.00 get this or any other locks they have
customer_reviews.author: mrpaul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product - still going strong after daily use in the Pacific NW
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Feels super-sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Feels just as super-sturdy and thief-proof as I was expecting. No proof that this is so yet, but maybe this lock will deter all attempts and I'll never actually find out if its sufficiently strong enough to prevent a well-kitted out and determined thief.
customer_reviews.author: N. Holden

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty small and hard to use in alot of cases
customer_reviews.text: as some of the other reviews mention, it's pretty small and hard to use in alot of cases. This ended up as a backup lock for just that reason
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Uncompromising.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is evident. The locking mechanism works as smooth as butter. The size is perfect for most bikes, but is a little small. The only con is the weight, but for the peace of mind.. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great size, may be a little overkill for where ...
customer_reviews.text: Killer lock for the price. Great size, may be a little overkill for where I live and the bikes I ride to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Fermatseye

customer_reviews.title: Like butter in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Nobody has tested this lock to my knowledge since I've had it. I will say it feels and operates like a high end product should. The locking mechanism is the smoothest I've ever experienced - like butter - and the u-bolt goes all the way through the lock, which gives it a more secure feel. It also doesn't feel bulky and has a reasonable weight. Will update the review if we have issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It does have all the merits I read about before I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: It does have all the merits I read about before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bike has not been stolen yet. This is nice. it is a good weight, a good color, a good feel. Overall a good, solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chen

customer_reviews.title: Solid & functional.
customer_reviews.text: This lock has worked for me for 6 months of daily use. The yellow gets dirty. It's solid.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice, hefty little lock
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, hefty little lock. A bit small, but I preffer a bit small. Locks on both side, good nonbike-damaging finish. It's too bad it doesn't come with a mount bracket. Otherwise nicely designed and certainly comes with enough keys.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good overall but lock takes some tries getting in the key, and u part is a little too small.

customer_reviews.title: These are great little locks with extra heavy shackles and a two ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great little locks with extra heavy shackles and a two pin locking mechanism. They are smaller, lighter and less expensive than the top-rated Abus Granite X 54 locks and provide almost the same level of security.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my road bike and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Linty

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock that makes sure that my bike is more ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid lock that makes sure that my bike is more secure than the other bikes around mine. Another cm inside length would have allowed me to lock the front wheel to the frame and pole.
customer_reviews.author: JVS from NorCal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully small, very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully small, very convenient. Great price on Amazon for a highly rated lock for security.

customer_reviews.text: Did lots of research, this is the best mini u lock without a doubt... abus needs to make a frame mount for this.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously one of the best locks out
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement lock after having to get my kryptonite evo mini lock cut off due to key falure. 1 1/2 years later with cut marks still on the coating of this lock I still have my bike.

customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped. Really strong and thick. Definitely smaller, but I can use it on any bike rack. Sometimes have to be creative.

customer_reviews.title: Solid build ABUS U-lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid U-lock! I can relate with other users issues with the key needing to be put in fully or else key wont turn. Furthermore, 1 of the 2 keys works better than the other for some reason. Also the lock is barely big enough to fit the frame and back tire to a bike rack; which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to confuse this product with the abus ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to confuse this product with the abus U-Mini 401 Yellow --> similar product with the gold rating.
customer_reviews.author: J Rose

product_meta.title: ABUS Mini Round Shackle U Lock, 5.5"/15mm
feature_bullets: GERMAN ENGINEERED 14MM HARDENED STEEL- Abus uses only the highest grade, special temper hardened steel for its components and has been doing so since 1924. These decades of experience and commitment to quality have made Abus one of the premiere lock manufacturers, keeping people’s bikes safe across the globe.

INDUSTRY LEADING CORROSION RESISTANCE- Don’t open yourself to easy thefts by using a degraded and corroded lock. Abus’s corrosion resistant coating and through-body shackle technology featured on the U-Lock keeps your bike secure for years.

LIGHT WEIGHT AND COMPACT- The U-Mini 40 lives up to its name by wrapping an incredibly strong, durable and secure bike lock into a small unit that can easily fit in your back pocket, won’t weigh your bag down in transit, and easily mounts to your frame.

ABUS PREMIUM CYLINDER PROTECTION- The general idea of a bike theft is that someone came with bolt-cutters and after slicing and dicing through your bike lock, they took off on your ride. This isn’t the only form of attack though and this is why in conjunction with the absolute best torsion resistance, Abus offers you their Premium Cylinder technology that protects the entire locking keyed mechanism from lock picking.

DOUBLE BOLTING SHACKLE- The Bolting Mechanism locks in two places, offering an elite level of security and doesn’t leave any weak spots in the armor for a bike thief to take advantage of. The U-Mini 40 makes it incredibly simple for you to ride where and when you want without fear of what could happen to your bike when you’re not rolling. The Soft Touch Coating even ensures that your paint job won’t get the slightest hint of a scuff.
